肠道细菌有一天可以用作微观内部药剂师数百种不同种类的微生物在您的肠道中生活，笑和爱。将来，其中之一可能具有新的功能：微观内部药剂师。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/gut-bacteria-could-one-nay-day-serve-serve-as-serv-as-s-microscopic-in-house-pharmacists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/gut-bacteria-could-one-day-serve-serve-serve-as-serv-s-microscopic-in-house-pharmacists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2a0c3cf-68b3-4302-949a-dd9deb58c3d0 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 20:19:56 -0500 Gut bacteria could one day serve as microscopic in-house pharmacists
